naslov: BOTINEC 88m2, P. Kvržice (4soban stan u prizemnici +parking +dvorište) (iznajmljivanje)
Lokacija: Grad Zagreb, Novi Zagreb - Zapad, Botinec
opis: ZA NAJAM Kuća: Zagreb (Botinec), 4soban, (netto)88 m2 + parking + vrt/dvorište + ljetna kuhinja + ostava i škladište   Stan se nalazi u kući prizemnici, na odličnoj lokaciji u srcu Botinca. Grijanje etažno plinsko, klimatiziran. Stanica za bus udaljena par minuta pješke. 2 parkinga ispred kuće. Sastoji se od: - Ulaza i hodnika - Predprostora - Kuhinje - 2 Spavaće sobe - velikog Dnevnog boravka - Kupaone s Toaletom - Garderobe/ostave - Ljetne kuhinje i vrta (- Spremišta/skladišta) Neto površina stana je 88 m2 i čine je pretprostor, vešeraj, kupaonica (s tuš kabinom i bideom), 2 velike spavaće sobe (14 i 17 m2), kuhinja + ostava (12 m2), veliki dnevni boravak i blagovaonica te mala radna soba (nastala pregradom unutar dnevnog boravka ukupne kvadrature 30 m2). Odmah ispred ulaza u stan su 2 vanjska parkirna mjesta ukupne površine 32 m2, a iza stana se nalazi vrt od 53 m2 unutar kojeg su zidano spremište od 7,5 m2 (s terasom iznad spremišta) i zidana ljetna kuhinjica od 2 m2. Stan ima centralno plinsko grijanje te split klima uređaj za dnevni boravak i blagovaonicu. Orijentacija stana: sjever, istok i jug. Stan se iznajmljuje potpuno namješten i opremljen. Djelomična adaptacija 2020., poglavito podova, parketa i pločica i stolarije.  Dostupno za obitelj. Režije niske, ukupno mjesečni prosjek 120€. Dugoročan najam, obavezan polog. Stan se može pogledati prema dogovoru. Slobodno nazovite za više informacija ili termin razgledavanja. --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- FOR RENT House: Zagreb (Botinec), 2 bedroom, 88 m2 + parking + garden/courtyard + summer kitchen + storage room The apartment is located in a one-story house, in a great location in the heart of Botinac. Gas heating, air-conditioned. The bus stop is a few minutes' walk away. 2 parking spaces in front of the house. Consists of: - Entrance and corridor - small Lobby - Kitchen - 2 Bedroom - a large Living room - Bathroom with toilet - Wardrobe/pantrie - Summer kitchen and garden (- Warehouse) The net area of the apartment is 88 m2 and consists of an entrance hall, laundry room, bathroom (with shower and bidet), 2 large bedrooms (14 and 17 m2), kitchen + pantry (12 m2), large living room and dining room and a small study (created by a partition inside the living room of the total square footage 30 m2). Right in front of the entrance to the apartment are 2 outdoor parking spaces with a total area of 32 m2, and behind the apartment there is a garden of 53 m2, which includes a brick storage room of 7.5 m2 (with a terrace above the storage room) and a brick summer kitchen of 2 m2. Apartment has central gas heating and split air conditioning for the living room and dining room. Orientation of the apartment: north, east and south. The apartment is rented fully furnished and equipped. Partial renovation in 2020, mainly floors, parquet and tiles and carpentry. Available for a family. Low overheads, a total monthly average of €120. Long-term lease, deposit required. Feel free to call for more information. The apartment can be viewed as agreed.
